scenes.title: Zion National Park
scenes.description: A national park with steep red cliffs, slot canyons, and popular hikes such as Angels Landing and The Narrows.

scenes.title: Snow Canyon State Park
scenes.description: A state park with sandstone cliffs, lava flows, and short trails through desert terrain.

scenes.title: St. George Temple
scenes.description: A white Latter-day Saint temple built in 1877, set against a red rock backdrop.

scenes.title: Pioneer Park
scenes.address: 375 Red Hills Pkwy, St. George, UT 84770
scenes.description: A city park with red rock formations, small slot canyons, and views of St. George.

scenes.title: Dinosaur Discovery Site
scenes.address: 2180 E Riverside Dr, St. George, UT 84790
scenes.description: A museum with preserved dinosaur tracks and fossil exhibits from the Early Jurassic period.

scenes.title: Tuacahn Amphitheatre
scenes.description: An outdoor theater in a red rock canyon that hosts musicals, concerts, and events.

scenes.title: St. George Art Museum
scenes.description: A small museum with changing exhibits of regional, Western, and Native American art.

scenes.title: Red Cliffs Desert Reserve
scenes.description: A protected area with hiking trails, desert plants, and wildlife habitat.
